title: Arcaea song metadata
description: The metadata of songs in Arcaea

id.description: The id of the song, used to find the folder containing the aff files and other resources

idx.description: The numeric id of the song, used in link play to determine the available charts

title_localized.description: The title of the song, localized in various languages

jacket_localized.description: Should localized jacket be used in various languages

en|ja|ko|zh-Hans|zh-Hant.description: Should the localized assets be used

artist_localized.description: The artist of the song, in various languages. Overrides artist

search_title.description: The strings used to search the song by title, in various languages

search_artist.description: The strings used to search the song by artist, in various languages

bpm.description: The bpm of the song, only used for displaying

bpm_base.description: The bpm used to calculating the note speed of the chart

set.description: The id of the pack of the song specified in the packlist file

purchase.description: The id of purchased item that is needed to play this song, normally is the id of song or pack

audioPreview.description: The start timestamp of song preview, in milliseconds

audioPreviewEnd.description: The end timestamp of song preview, in milliseconds

side.description: The side of the song, 0 for light, 1 for conflict, 2 for colorless, 3 for lephon

world_unlock.description: Does playing the song require unlocking it in world mode

byd_local_unlock.description: Should the unlock state of beyond difficulty of the song saved locally (instead of saved online)

songlist_hidden.description: Should the song be hidden in the songlist before unlocking it

bg.description: The name of the background used when playing the song

bg_inverse.description: The name of the background used when playing the song with a partner which can inverse the side of the song

bg_daynight.description: The name of the background used when playing the song with a partner which can change the side of the song to match the current time

day.description: The name of the background used when playing the song in the day

night.description: The name of the background used when playing the song in the night

date.description: The Unix timestamp of the time when the song is added, used to sort the songs by time

version.description: The version where the song was published, used to categorize songs by version

remote_dl.description: Is the assets of the song stored on the remote server

source_localized.description: The source of the song, localized in various languages

source_copyright.description: The copyright information of the song

no_stream.description: Should the song be not playable in the streamer mode

additional_files.description: Additional files to be downloaded with the song

requirement.description: The condition that this file is used

ratingClass.description: The rating class of the difficulty, 0 for past, 1 for present, 2 for future, 3 for beyond, and 4 for eternal

chartDesigner.description: The designer of the chart of the difficulty

jacketDesigner.description: The designer of the jacket of the difficulty

rating.description: The rating of the difficulty, 0 for "?", other number for corresponding number value. before 3.0.0 it is 0 for "?", 10 for "9+", 11 for "10" and 1~9 for corresponding number value

ratingPlus.description: Should the difficulty of the chart annotated with a plus sign, like 9+, 10+

legacy11.description: Should the chart use a harder gauge, like all the chart with 11 or higher difficulties before 6.0.0

plusFingers.description: Should this charts be played with more than two fingers. This field is not longer used since the judging code can normally handle multiple fingers now

jacketOverride.description: Is a different jacket used for the difficulty

title_localized.description: The title of the song in this difficulty, localized in various languages

artist.description: The artist of the song in this difficulty

artist_localized.description: The artist of the song in this difficulty, in various languages. Overrides artist

audioOverride.description: Is a different audio used for the difficulty

jacket_night.description: The name of the jacket used in the night in the difficulty

hidden_until_unlocked.description: Should this chart be hidden in the songlist before unlocking it

hidden_until.description: The condition to reveal the hidden song, none for always visible, always for always hidden, difficulty for unlock of the difficulty, song for unlock of the song, unlockconditions for satisfying specific unlock conditions

world_unlock.description: Does playing the difficulty requires unlocking it in world mode

bg.description: The name of the background used for this difficulty when playing the song, override the bg of the song

bg_inverse.description: The name of the background used when playing the song with a partner which can inverse the side of the song

bpm.description: The bpm of the this difficulty, only used for displaying, override the bpm of the song

bpm_base.description: The bpm used to calculating the note speed of the chart in this difficulty, override the bpm_base of the song

version.description: The version where this difficulty was published, used to categorize songs by version, override the version of the song

date.description: The Unix timestamp of the time when this difficulty is added, used to sort the songs by time, override the date of the song

localized_string.$comment: The schema is used as a schema for localized string

localized_search_string.$comment: The schema is used as a schema for localized strings used for search

en|ja|ko|zh-Hans|zh-Hant.description: The localized strings used for search
